ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!
ygData.msgSnippet: The song works fine.  It gives no message and no sound.  If you watch you will see a faint blue glow around the mob when you sing it.  I have about 80% success
ygData.messageBody:
The song works fine. It gives no message and no sound. If you watch you
will see a faint blue glow around the mob when you sing it. I have about
80% success with dropping dmg shields on the first try with this song. And
rarely have I had to sing more than 2 or 3 pulses to get rid of them.
Target yourself after someone buffs you and sing it (it will NOT work on
another player unless you're duelling). You will have to have them re-buff
you afterwards though ;)

The song works fine. I use it all the time. If I'm in a dungeon where I
can expect lots of dmg shields on mobs I always keep it memmed.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath since Beta 2
> Easy enough to test. Get a friend (caster hopefully) and have him cast
> every buff he has on himself. Keep hitting him with the song and see what
> happens.
>
> It seems to me I never get a message when i use the song. No dispel, no
> resist, just nothing happens. Is there some trick to the song?
>
